title: Skill Manifest (skill.json)
description: Agent Skills Standard manifest file for Narratoria skills

name.description: Unique skill identifier (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens only)

displayName.description: Human-readable skill name for UI display

description.description: Brief description of the skill's purpose and capabilities

homepage.description: URL to skill documentation or repository

prompt.description: Relative path to behavioral prompt file

configSchema.description: Relative path to configuration schema file

scripts.description: Executable scripts provided by this skill

capabilities.description: List of capability tags for skill selection (e.g., 'narration', 'dice', 'memory')

dependencies.description: Other skills this skill depends on

priority.description: Selection priority when multiple skills match (higher = preferred)

retryPolicy.description: Default retry policy for all scripts in this skill

name.description: Script identifier used in Plan JSON toolPath

path.description: Relative path to executable within skill directory

inputSchema.description: Relative path to JSON Schema for script input

required.description: If true, skill cannot function without this script
